# Install

- Install **{rtweet}** [CRAN](https://cran.r-project/package=rtweet).

```{r}
install.packages("rtweet")
```

- Or install the **development version** from [Github](https://github.com/mkearney/rtweet).

```{r}
devtools::install_github("mkearney/rtweet")
```

- Load **{rtweet}**

```{r}
library(rtweet)
```
